entry.title: Research Data Analysis & Visualization
Manuscript Editing & Proofreading
LLM Workflow Integration
entry.summary: Project Description: Designed and implemented an LLM-based workflow integration system that processes inputs through multiple LLM calls with conditional gating logic. The system ensures dynamic decision-making and optimized output generation. Built using Streamlit, Ollama, LangChain, and Python to create a seamless and automated workflow. Skills…
entry.content:
• Project Description: Designed and implemented an LLM-based workflow integration system that processes inputs through multiple LLM calls with conditional gating logic. The system ensures dynamic decision-making and optimized output generation. Built using Streamlit, Ollama, LangChain, and Python to create a seamless and automated workflow.
  • Skills and Deliverables: LLM Integration, Workflow Automation, LangChain, Streamlit, Python, Ollama

entry.title: Bulk PDF Extraction using LLM
entry.summary: Project Description: Developed an AI-powered system for bulk PDF extraction using LLMs. The pipeline integrates document embedding, vector storage, and multimodal LLMs to retrieve relevant information efficiently. Built with Streamlit for UI, Ollama for model hosting, and LangChain for seamless retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) capabilities. Skills…
entry.content:
• Project Description: Developed an AI-powered system for bulk PDF extraction using LLMs. The pipeline integrates document embedding, vector storage, and multimodal LLMs to retrieve relevant information efficiently. Built with Streamlit for UI, Ollama for model hosting, and LangChain for seamless retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) capabilities.
  • Skills and Deliverables: PDF Processing, LLM Integration, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), LangChain, Streamlit, Ollama, Python

entry.title: Multimodal RAG App
entry.summary: Project Description: Built a multimodal Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application that enhances information retrieval from documents using an embedding model and vector store. The system processes user queries, retrieves contextually relevant data, and generates responses using a multimodal LLM. Integrated with Streamlit for UI, Gemini for…
entry.content:
• Project Description: Built a multimodal Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) application that enhances information retrieval from documents using an embedding model and vector store. The system processes user queries, retrieves contextually relevant data, and generates responses using a multimodal LLM. Integrated with Streamlit for UI, Gemini for LLM processing, LangChain for orchestration, and Chroma for vector storage.
  • Skills and Deliverables: RAG Pipeline, Multimodal LLM, ChromaDB, LangChain, Streamlit, Gemini AI

entry.title: Sentiment Analysis, Topic & Keyword Extraction using LLM
entry.summary: Project Description: Developed an AI-powered sentiment analysis system that classifies reviews into positive, neutral, and negative sentiments. The system also extracts key topics and keywords using LLMs for deeper insights. Built with Streamlit for UI, Ollama for model hosting, LangChain for NLP orchestration, and Python…
entry.content:
• Project Description: Developed an AI-powered sentiment analysis system that classifies reviews into positive, neutral, and negative sentiments. The system also extracts key topics and keywords using LLMs for deeper insights. Built with Streamlit for UI, Ollama for model hosting, LangChain for NLP orchestration, and Python for data processing.
  • Skills and Deliverables: Sentiment Analysis, NLP, Keyword Extraction, LangChain, Streamlit, Ollama, Python

entry.title: Automated Document & Image Tagging using VLM
entry.summary: Project Description: Developed an AI-powered system for automated document and image tagging using a Vision-Language Model (VLM). The pipeline processes documents and images, classifies content into relevant categories (e.g., Finance, Politics, Technology), and assigns metadata tags for better organization. Built using Streamlit for UI, Llama…
entry.content:
• Project Description: Developed an AI-powered system for automated document and image tagging using a Vision-Language Model (VLM). The pipeline processes documents and images, classifies content into relevant categories (e.g., Finance, Politics, Technology), and assigns metadata tags for better organization. Built using Streamlit for UI, Llama 3.2 for classification, LangChain for orchestration, and Python for data processing.
  • Skills and Deliverables: Vision-Language Models (VLM), Document Classification, Image Tagging, LangChain, Streamlit, Llama 3.2, Python

entry.title: Multi-Agents Chatbot
entry.summary: Project Description: Developed a multi-agent chatbot that enables flexible conversation patterns, including joint and hierarchical chats. Integrated agent customization with Conversable AI and multiple LLMs. Built using Streamlit, Gemini, LangChain, and CrewAI to enhance collaboration and automation. Skills and Deliverables: AI Chatbot, Multi-Agent Systems, LangChain,…
entry.content:
• Project Description: Developed a multi-agent chatbot that enables flexible conversation patterns, including joint and hierarchical chats. Integrated agent customization with Conversable AI and multiple LLMs. Built using Streamlit, Gemini, LangChain, and CrewAI to enhance collaboration and automation.
  • Skills and Deliverables: AI Chatbot, Multi-Agent Systems, LangChain, Streamlit, CrewAI
